entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 8:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 50 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
